name: Sourkids vs the Gummies
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND WILL BE UPDATED

In the year 2021, The sourkids reigned supreme in Kinoplex and lived in harmony together in their peaceful village. However, this peace is about to be undone, the evil gum monsters and their alliances have attacked the sourkids' village. And now this one green sourkid is the only hope to save Kinoplex from the evil gummies. Fight across several man-made environments and destroy anything in your past to bring peace back to Kinoplex.

PISSSHITTERS OFFICIAL WEBSITE
